
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is named typed tuple-like.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether a value is named typed tuple-like.

    Examples
    --------
    > var Point = {{alias:@stdlib/utils/named-typed-tuple}}( [ 'x', 'y' ] );
    > var p = new Point();
    > var bool = {{alias}}( p )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ] )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( 3.14 )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( {} )
    false

    See Also
    --------
